tutorials.title: Adding an Environment to connect to IBM Cloud
tutorials.shortDescription: Add an environment to connect to a cloud instance and deploy a smart contract

tutorials.title: Debug a smart contract
tutorials.description: Learn how to make iterative changes to your smart contract using the VS Code debugger

series.name: Introduction
series.shortDescription: Series of tutorials that will introduce the basic concepts
series.longDescription: Get started with a series of tutorials that show you how to develop a Hyperledger Fabric smart contract locally, then deploy it into an IBM Blockchain Platform cloud environment. You'll also create a gateway to the cloud environment and see how client applications submit and evaluate transactions against a ledger.

tutorials.title: Local smart contract development
tutorials.description: Follow the typical workflow from generating a new smart contract project, deploying code to the Local Fabric runtime, and testing your transactions via an application gateway.

tutorials.title: Create a cloud blockchain deployment
tutorials.description: Sign up for the IBM Blockchain Platform service on IBM Cloud, and configure a simple environment ready to deploy your smart contracts to.

tutorials.title: Deploying and transacting with IBM Cloud
tutorials.description: Export smart contracts from VSCode, deploy them in your environment on IBM Cloud, then send transactions from your local machine by creating a gateway.
